start: ^Why did you just kill that lady!
one: ^It was time for her to go to sleep. It is one of my favorite magic tricks I like to call "The Knockout".
^Who are you and what are you doing here?
oneA: ^I am The Magician. I have been watching you your whole life, since you were a child...
oneB: ^I came here today to confront you. It is time I show you a magic trick.
^What are you talking about? Get out of here!
oneC: ^I am going nowhere... I will not leave here until I show you my magic trick. Are you ready?

c-1: ^I will not repeat myself. Now follow me...

two: ^I am The Magician. But some might call me a wanderer, in this empty, pathless universe we call home...
^What are you doing here? I am calling the police.
twoA: ^You will do no such thing. Besides, they won't be able to see me.
twoB: ^I came here to show you a magic trick, I have been waiting to show you this since you were a child...
twoC: ^I like to make people disappear. Anything you thought wasn't possible, I can prove you wrong.
^Please, just get out of here. I don't want any trouble.

c-0: ^I came from a planet far away in the universe. Farther than any human can imagine. I have been on Earth for 648 years...
c-1: ^There will be no trouble, however, you must do what I say or I promise you there will be trouble.

twoD: ^This can't be real, what do you need from me..?
twoE: ^I need you to follow me. Now.
